'''Gina Rakoff''' is the former foster mother of [[Betsey Parker]].

==History==
Gina and her husband, Phil, came into the ER when their foster daughter, Betsey, fell down the stairs. Because of that injury and a previous healed clavicle fracture, Cooper suspected she was being abused. Naomi got Gina and Phil out of the room and Cooper asked her about it, but she said she fell. When they figured out what was happening, the Rakoffs asked Cooper to leave.

Cooper called in [[Gladys]] because of his concerns. Gladys said she believed he was wrong, but she'd follow-up on his complaint.

Later, while eating ice cream with Marshall, Sheldon had concerns that Marshall was the one who had hurt Betsey. He went to the Rakoffs about it, but they were angry at the implication and refused to listen.

Sheldon went to Gina alone and deduced that she'd already been concerned about Marshall. She said that she'd known for a while that he was different, but she didn't want to see it. She thought bringing another kid into their home would give him a friend. She told a comatose Betsey that she loved her and left, saying she needed to put Marshall first.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is married to [[Phil Rakoff]].

===Familial===
Her son, Marshall, has emotional problems. Because of this, she and her husband stopped fostering Betsey to focus on his care.
